key.name: admin_plugin_required_notification
key.value: Avatar History requires for Oxwall Photo plugin

key.name: config_photo_album_name_desc
key.value: Choose a name for the album where avatars will be added. Don't forget to translate the album title to other languages on your site.

key.name: plugin_required_tip
key.value: Since the plugin is extension for the Oxwall Photo plugin you can not use it separately.
